Paused(bytes32,address).details: Emitted when an {id} is paused by {sender}.

UnPaused(bytes32,address).details: Emitted when an {id} is unpaused by {sender}.

isPaused(bytes32).details: A blank id ("") is equivalent to the whole protocol. If a specific facet should be paused, pass its encoded id.

params.id: Encoded id of a facet to {pause}.

pause(bytes32,bool).details: A blank id ("") is equivalent to the whole protocol. If a specific facet should be paused, pass its encoded id.

params.id: Encoded id of a facet to {pause}.
params.state: The new state that {id} should be in. Requirements:  - Sender must have the PAUSER role.

isPaused(bytes32).notice: Checks if an id is paused.

pause(bytes32,bool).notice: Puts an id in the given state.

params.state: The new state that {id} should be in. Requirements:  - Sender must have the PAUSER role.
